clues.answer: SMTP uses this port number for basic mail transfer between servers.
SMTP with STARTTLS encryption uses this alternative port for mail submission.
POP3 email retrieval protocol operates on this port number.
IMAP email access protocol uses this port for server-based email storage.
LDAP directory services operate on this standard port number.
HTTP web traffic uses this default port number.
HTTPS secure web traffic operates on this port number.
SSH secure shell and SFTP use this port number.
Telnet remote access protocol uses this port number.
Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol operates on this port number.
DNS domain name resolution uses this port number.
Network Time Protocol for clock synchronization uses this port.
SNMP queries and agent communications use this port number.
SNMP trap notifications are sent using this port number.
Syslog system logging protocol uses this port number.
FTP data transfer connections use this port number.
FTP control and command connections operate on this port.
TFTP simple file transfer protocol uses this port number.
SMB file and printer sharing protocol operates on this port.
Microsoft SQL Server database communications use this port number.
DHCP server communications use this port number.
DHCP client communications operate on this port number.
LDAPS secure directory access protocol uses this port number.
SIP unencrypted VoIP signaling uses this port number.
SIP with TLS encryption operates on this port number.
